about_the_game:
Retro Golden Age games revive the glorious past of Spanish classics action, platform and puzzle game from the classics as originally designed by their creators and experienced by your parents and your parents' friends.

The Retro Golden Age line also adds an "Experience 2023" mode that allows you to go back in time up to 5 minutes to correctly retrace your steps to succes.

It's up to you to live the adventure “fair and square”, or with aids that allow you to live the full experience.
---



David Livingstone, famous English missionary and explorer, went to Africa on a sanitary and cartographic mission to establish the Zambeza and Nile river basins when he disappeared...

But after several years without news of him, the New York Herald newspaper sent the British explorer and journalist Henry Morton Stanley in search of him. His starting point: Zanzibar, on the east coast of Africa, the last place he was seen alive.

Stanley, knowing the dangerous path, prepares himself for the many dangers that await him, such as wild animals, natural obstacles and anthropophagous tribes, among others.

To avoid them, he carries his three favourite weapons with him, each of which has different attributes: the knife, a horizontally moving throwing object with a gravity fall, the boomerang with its classic movement and the grenades with a parabolic movement. In addition, you have your favourite pole with which you can jump over mountains and chasms.

The Retro Golden Age line also adds an "Experience 2023" mode that allows you to go back in time up to 5 minutes to correctly retrace your steps to succes.

It's up to you to live the adventure “fair and square”, or with aids that allow you to live the full experience.
